entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 21.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 21. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Fog patches dissipating late in the morning. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 26 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Sunday 05 February 2023
